Summary: longer than any airplaine from same distance. 1 white light in front and back. 1 red light close to front light
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around August 29th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI work near DIA and always see airplanes from a few miles out taking off or landing. this caught my eye because it was much longer than any passenger plane.it had 1 bright white light in the front with 1 red light just behind the white light and 1 white light at the rear. the lights were not flashing. I could not see anything that may of been wing lights. the objects shape and real size is unknown because it was around 1 am and all I seen was the lights moving. what was also strange was the speed of the object. it seemed to be flying way faster than the planes going to and from DIA. I was heading west on I-70 after work and it was heading north around 3 or 4 miles away and about 1 mile above the ground.it seemed to be traveling about 4 or 5 times faster and was about 4 times longer than jets I see near the airport. I lost sight of the object as it flew too far north.
